channel.title: Race to 99
channel.description:
Well, with receiving my membership back again, I thought about testing out the "99 Hunter in 2 weeks" theory.
[b]Goal:[/b] 99/99
[b]Current:[/b] [IMG]http://i195.photobucket.com/albums/z20/Exe626/Lv63.png[/img]

item.title: Race to 99
item.dc:creator: @billygotshot billygotshot
item.description:
@billygotshot wrote:

[quote=“Frell, post:39, topic:181551”][quote author=Not X A Alex link=topic=243075.msg2060935#msg2060935 date=1203316502]

Yeah. I could have gotten 63 right away, then went and got 70 by now, but I’ve done nothing but straight hunter, I’m afraid I might lose interest too soon.

Thats what I did. I sadly stopped around 45 Hunter. I was going for 63.
[/quote]
The amount of attention needed to be payed to get the goal is killer, it will effect you when you get close to 80, same thing happened to me and fletching… stopped at 79.[/quote]

really? I stopped at 91 when i realized i could just scam for money.

Read full topic

item.title: Race to 99
item.dc:creator: @Frell Frell
item.description:
@Frell wrote:

[quote=“Not X A Alex, post:16, topic:181551”][quote author=exe626 link=topic=243075.msg2060920#msg2060920 date=1203316276]
Yeah. I could have gotten 63 right away, then went and got 70 by now, but I’ve done nothing but straight hunter, I’m afraid I might lose interest too soon.
[/quote]
Thats what I did. I sadly stopped around 45 Hunter. I was going for 63.[/quote]
The amount of attention needed to be payed to get the goal is killer, it will effect you when you get close to 80, same thing happened to me and fletching… stopped at 79.

Read full topic

item.title: Race to 99

item.description:
@spankjava wrote:

i saw the theory on runescape-community gl exe

Read full topic

item.title: Race to 99
item.dc:creator: @exe626 exe626
item.description:
@exe626 wrote:

It took me 2 days playing close to 2 hours a day to get 40. After you get 3-5 levels over the creature you’re trying to hunt, they become such fast exp it’s sickening. I couldn’t hunt today though, after searching about 30 worlds(even the German server) I couldn’t find an empty world to catch red chins. So I’ll try again tomorrow.

Read full topic

item.title: Race to 99
item.dc:creator: @bootnecklad bootnecklad
item.description:
@bootnecklad wrote:

How much of an attention span does it take to get to 40 or 50 and how long?
Exe pm me your user and then add me

Read full topic

item.title: Race to 99
item.dc:creator: @The_Wise_Guy .Kaboom
item.description:
@The_Wise_Guy wrote:

Yeah but dragons are incredibly busy at the minigame, and incredibly hard to find around the game.

Read full topic

item.title: Race to 99
item.dc:creator: @exe626 exe626
item.description:
@exe626 wrote:

I finally stabilized my connection, it only took 7 hours to do. I went ahead and got lv63, time for red chinchompa’s :D.

edit:
I was looking at the Impling’s I can catch as I level up, too see the possible loot. I must say, wow.

Magpie’s(Lv.65):
Amulet of power (3), Black dragonhide (6) (Noted), Diamond (4) (Noted), Dragon dagger, Loop half of a key, Mystic boots (blue), Mystic gloves (blue/white), Nature tiara, Pineapple tree seed, Ring of forging (3), Ring of life (3), Rune sq shield, Rune warhammer, Runite bar (2) (Noted), Sinister key, Snapdragon seed, Splitbark gauntlets, Teeth half of a key.

Ninja’s(Lv.74):
Black dragonhide (10) (Noted), Dagannoth hide (3) (Noted), Drag dagger (p++), Dragon dagger, Dragon dagger §, Harralander seed, Mystic boots (blue), Mystic gloves (blue/white), Onyx bolt tips (4), Onyx bolts (2), Opal machete, Prayer potion (4, 3 doses) (Noted), Ranarr seed, Rune arrow (70), Rune chainbody, Rune claws, Rune dart (70), Rune knife (40), Rune scimitar, Rune sq shield, Rune thrownaxe (50), Snakeskin boots, Snapdragon seed, Splitbark helm, Torstol seed, Weapon poison (+) (4) (Noted).

Dragon’s(Lv.83):
Amulet of glory (4) (3-4) (Noted), Babydragon bones, Death talisman, Death tiara, Dragon arrow (166-212), Dragon arrowheads (138-326), Dragon bolts (16-28), Dragon bones, Dragon dagger (p++) (3) (Noted), Dragon dart (178-203), Dragon dart tips (158), Dragon longsword, Dragonstone (3) (Noted), Dragonstone bolt tips, Magic seed, Mystic robe bottom (blue/white), Snapdragon seed (6), Summer pie (15) (Noted).

Even if Red Chinchompa’s don’t make me incredibly rich, I’ll sure as hell get it off these things.

Read full topic

item.title: Race to 99
item.dc:creator: @exe626 exe626
item.description:
@exe626 wrote:

I’ve taken a short break, I’ll start up hunting again tomorrow. I’m hoping for at least 63, so I can start reds, but I imagine I’ll get it very quickly from 61. I imagine by the end of the week I’ll be close to level 90 or so.

Read full topic

bootnecklad:

I would know My classic account ‘Littlebootie’ Level 122 (one away from max) Sadly forgot classic and lost password, you may say, mmmm how miraculous but things like that happen.

I am not doubting you.

item.title: Race to 99
item.dc:creator: @mod_taharok Taharok
item.description:
@mod_taharok wrote:

[quote=“bootnecklad, post:18, topic:181551”]Sadly things like losing intrest suck, thats why I do small bits at a time, e.g I wanted 60 strenght and i was40, yes easy but I lose intrest with things very quickly, so i went 10 levels one week (yes very slow but eh.) did something else another week and then finaly got 60 the last.

That was to long and didn’t make any sense.[/quote]

As much as this is able to be compared to the current situation, you cannot fully understand what he is doing unless you have had to train a skill over 80; especially one over 90. It takes A LONG time, so procrastination can not be practiced if you wish for this extreme of a goal to be accomplished.

Read full topic

item.description:

You don’t need money for 99 strength. Just go to experiments or rock crabs and kill about 100k of em

I need weapons, armor, and food.

it adds up…[/quote]
